cyclone.name: HERMINE
cyclone.current_location: about 280 mi SSW of Apalachicola, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving north-northeast across the northeast Gulf toward Florida’s Big Bend, then forecast to track up the U.S. East Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Florida Big Bend coast between Suwannee River and Mexico Beach

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from Anclote River to Suwannee River FL and west of Mexico Beach to Destin FL
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Suwannee River to Mexico Beach FL; Tropical-Storm Warning Anclote River to Suwannee River FL and west of Mexico Beach to Destin FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Big Bend, Georgia, the Carolinas, and eventually the mid-Atlantic coast
weather_observation.wind: Only a minimal (≤5 %) chance of 34-kt winds at the port; significant winds are not expected.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for Plaquemines Port District, LA.
weather_observation.rainfall: None expected; heavy rain focus is Florida to the Carolinas.
